mapper.select: select status from openexperiment.key_project_status where project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT key_project_status.project_id AS id, key_project_status.`status` AS status, key_project_status.create_time AS createTime, project_group.creator_id AS creatorId, project_group.end_time AS endTime, project_group.experiment_condition AS experimentCondition, project_group.suggest_group_type AS suggestGroupType, project_group.project_type as projectType, project_group.experiment_type AS experimentType, project_group.achievement_check AS achievementCheck, project_group.fit_people_num AS fitPeopleNum, project_group.apply_funds AS applyFunds, project_group.project_name AS projectName, project_group.lab_name AS labName, project_group.address AS address, project_group.main_content AS mainContent, project_group.serial_number AS serialNumber, project_group.limit_college AS limitCollege, project_group.limit_grade AS limitGrade, project_group.limit_major AS limitMajor, project_group.total_hours AS totalHours, project_group.start_time AS startTime, project_group.is_open_topic AS isOpenTopic, `user`.real_name AS creatorName, `user`.`code` AS userid, project_file.id AS projectFileId FROM openexperiment.user_project_group, openexperiment.project_group INNER JOIN openexperiment.key_project_status ON project_group.id = key_project_status.project_id left join openexperiment.`user` on key_project_status.creator_id = user.`code` left join openexperiment.project_file on project_file.project_group_id = project_group.id WHERE `user_project_group`.`user_id` = #{userId}
and key_project_status.`status` = #{status}
select count(project_id) from openexperiment.key_project_status where `status` = #{status} and subordinate_college = #{college}
